title: riot memeber pelase read this i need your help!!!!1
body:
please riot member its about the urgot rework. i was an aspiring urgot main who worked hard just because of one thing that urgot had (oh no i mean 2). you see, my name used to be "urgot juice" as you can tell this was referring to that glorious green liquid that spilled out of urgot when he died. and i see, you guys have removed that. its not good how will i live now, he needs juice. like if there is no juice then what has urgot become!!??
also, whenever people saw me play urgot they were always complimenting me on my fat flabs. and as i see now!!! URGOT HAS NO MORE FLAT FLABS. this character is a historic piece to league and you are taking away the essentials.
all i ASK of you is to ask the design team to implement juice and add atleast one fat flab. who will i be without urg- i mean who would ugot be without the juice or the flabs! please riot please try your best for me. you don't want to make me cry do you?
see look :( now im crying

replies.body:
Y'know.....I kind of agree xD. TBH, just not enough juice. But at least now we have a "Will It Blend" Champ xD

**#BRINGJUICEBACK2017**
i agree with mr juice, who will urgot be without his fat and his juice? #BRINGJUICEBACK2017
